confirmDeleteFolderBookmarks.message: Are you sure you want to delete $folderName$ folder and $bookmarkCount$ bookmark(s) in it?

confirmDeleteFolderSubfolders.message: Are you sure you want to delete $folderName$ folder and $subFolderCount$ sub-folder(s) in it?

confirmDeleteFolderSubfoldersBookmarks.message: Are you sure you want to delete $folderName$ folder, $subFolderCount$ sub-folder(s) and $bookmarkCount$ bookmark(s) in it?

confirmOpenBookmarks.description: Confirmation message for opening all bookmarks.
confirmOpenBookmarks.message: Are you sure you want to open all $count$ bookmarks?

confirmOpenBookmarksNewIncognitoWindow.description: Confirmation message for opening all bookmarks in a new incognito window.
confirmOpenBookmarksNewIncognitoWindow.message: Are you sure you want to open all $count$ bookmarks in a new incognito window?

confirmOpenBookmarksNewWindow.description: Confirmation message for opening all bookmarks in a new window.
confirmOpenBookmarksNewWindow.message: Are you sure you want to open all $count$ bookmarks in a new window?

noTitle.description: The title for untitled bookmarks with no http(s) URL or untitled folders.

openBookmarksIncognitoWindow.message: Open all bookmarks in incognito window

openBookmarksNewWindow.message: Open all bookmarks in new window

optionCloseUnusedFolders.message: Close unused folders when opening a folder.

optionConfirmOpenFolder.message: Display confirmation when opening a lot of bookmarks from a folder.

optionOpenNewTab.message: Middle-click or control-click opens bookmark in new background tab (instead of foreground).

optionPopupStays.message: Popup stays open when opening (left-clicking) bookmarks.

optionRememberPrevState.message: Remember previous state (scroll position and opened folders).

optionsFooterText.description: Footer text for the Options page

parentFolder.description: Parent folder information displayed in the tooltip of bookmarks in search results list.
